column5: I asked for plainer boards,the kids think its something to do with tobagining(to go faster and straighter).I had a good chuckle and kept it at that.I will see in the morning what santa brought me.What did you guys get and was it something you asked for fishing wise.A few years back I asked for an ice fishing sled and I got it(an otter),the kids thought it was a tobagin,I installed skiis to it and guess what.We took it out on the hills.That is one fast sled,and towed it behind a 4 wheeler,she held at 30mph.the otter is one strong sled.
Santa was pretty darn good to me...portable fish finder, new rod and a nice assortment of lures + a nice little Nikon Coolpix for fishing photos and video!
I didn't need any fishing gear at all but it was still a wonderful Christmas.  Hopefully everyone else had an enjoyable day too.

I didn't get what I wanted for Christmas in the fishing department at all..... I was greedy in my hopes though. I dared to dream it would be possible to get out Christmas morning fishing for steel, without freezing rain and high winds. Oh well maybe next year.
Top of the morning to you Lew. I was just happy everyone spent the day together here. It is so good to have them all here at the same time ! Forgot just how noisy it can get !

I did end up with alot of new lures but the best part was spending time with my family the dang kids had a blast as dad always sais this year was great but wait for next year I know this will be the best one ever my daughter still believes (or she hides it well) my son was so pumped everyone showed up to moms very early and we had a great day.  here are a couple pics of some of what I got  This was for dad for Christmas but we gave it to him last Sept when it was done from Advance Wildlife Taxidermy   I also got some New Woodies the Minnee mee these things are great looking in the water I was down at the river casting them and cant wait for June to get here or maybe some ice out pike action   I have just two plow baits and love the action on them so I had to ask for a couple perch baits for all year musky fishing.   I did also pick up some Jakes and Beleivers as the price was to good to pass up Kinda a gift from me to me LOL
Santa was good to me, got some BPS money and some other gifts. Looking forward to spending the $$ in February.
got a couple BPS gift cards, new custom rod from backwoods rods, and a new camera... fuji Z33 water proof camera

I got a new camera, the Olympus Tough 6000. It takes pretty good pics, but the best part about it's waterproof (10ft), shockproof (5ft), and freezeproof (-10).    Also, i got a pair of merino wool socks, so my feet won't be as cold when i fish in the winter.

Hi all! And Merry Christmas! It was a pretty quiet Christmas for me fishing-wise. Greg at Bill's Bait and Tackle in Hamilton is always very helpful in picking out gifts for me and this year was no exception.    We are going to my parent's house this afternoon, so hopefully my mom made the pilgrimage to Bill's as well. Best to all! Jim
i woke up with a hang over and in some random girls bed....i hope i didnt get anything!!
That's the spirit! Jim

Great christmas fishing wise.  Scored a new Helly Hansen floater coat, clamp-on cleets, picked up a new Olympus E-420 SLR, and even managed to make it out steelheading for an hour or two in between the morning and dinner.
Thus the name "worm dangler!"

Arent they a great bunch at bills bait.I was there this morning to wish them a merry xmass and all,and to get my bait.There was only two of us on the grand one on each side.Me on the north.Lost a lunker pickerel and nailed a baby pike.
I recognize him from caledonia santa hat and all.I hope his bellys full.Mine will be soon.Little minnow theif.3 times today.Ill get you.

Santa was good to me also,new themals, a coat and 2 plainers boards.hehe.one left and one right.The kids now think its to steer the tobagin with your feet.one on the left and the other I told them.It will put you in the drink on my sled.  One fast ice sled on the hills i tell ya.

Well, my little Elf had a good laugh on me yesterday.  I did NOT get an BP gift cards as she had suggested.  However, being the smart little one that she is... she told everyone that I NEEDED a new WATERPROOF Camera.  They gave me a Fujifilm FinepixZ33WP camera...  Then she said, daddy can use it for work too mommy  I am looking forward to trying it out tomorrow....  Hopefully it will "catch" a rainbow as I sure as heck haven't caught one yet this fall wink.
LMAO i guess your gift to her will come 9 months down the road???

Merry Christmas all, sounds like you were all good over the past year  Like many other’s have already stated, spoiled at the Gman's residence as well.  Christmas is about the kids however Mrs. Clause just wanted some extra $$ to shop on boxing day and during our annual vacantion to Ft.Myers in March.  Both girls got their fair share of dolls and princess paraphernalia.  Santa also left us a fantastic family gift – Wii Fitness Plus with the box, matt, and all controllers including nunchucks (hear that Chuck Norris! ) Wii Sports, Extreme Challenge and Rapala Fishing.  And to top it off Mrs.Claus also let daddy order the ultimate family gift,,,a new Ranger with all the fixins   Cheers G.
i got a new shimano clarious 7 6 flipping rod and a fish tv underwater camera
I got spoiled got a new ultra light st croix!,new flyrod,ice jigs,some arrows for my bow,gulp alive trout worms and thats what I got in the outdoor department!
hammered christmas eve and woke with a nasty hangover and lots of steelhead gear gotta lov it
